elements.description: Questions that the study aims to answer
Explanation of why the study is important
Details of research design and data collection methods
Display of study findings, highlighting significant data
Interpretation of the study results and their integration with existing research
End remarks of the study, specifying its implications for the academic field

introduction.format: Brief description of problem, literature review, and method

body.format: Details of methods used, discussions, and results

conclusion.format: Summary of the study and its findings

font_size.meaning: Minimum size of the font for the manuscript is 12 pt

font_type.meaning: Recommended type of font for the manuscript is Times New Roman

paper_color.meaning: Color of the paper should be white

paper_format.meaning: Format of the paper should be A4

page.meaning: Report should be completed on one side of sheet only

research_questions.meaning: Questions about the topic, hypothesis, variables, data collection and analysis methods
research_questions.importance: Sets the direction and scope of the study

data_collection_protocol.meaning: The standardized procedures used to collect data

data_analysis_methods.meaning: Statistical procedures, software or mathematical equations used to analyze the collected data

data_significance_criteria.meaning: The probability threshold used to determine significance of the results

methods_comparison.meaning: Comparison of the current research methods with previously reported methods

results_description.meaning: The overall description of the experimental results and the data

contradicting_results.meaning: Mention of any results that contradict the hypotheses and explanation of why they are anomalous

principles_relationships_generalizations.meaning: Presentation of principles, relationships and generalizations shown by the research results

exceptions.meaning: Pointing out any exceptions or any lack of correlation and defining unsettled points

comparison_with_published_work.meaning: Discussion on how the research results and interpretations agree or contrast with previously published work

theoretical_implications.meaning: Theoretical implications of the research work

practical_applications.meaning: Possible practical applications of the research work

conclusions.meaning: The final thoughts, findings or conclusions derived from the research

supporting_evidence.meaning: Summarizing the evidence for each conclusion

review_types.meaning: Types of reviews a research manuscript can undergo - single-blind or double-blind review

journal_information.meaning: Detailed information about the journal, its aim and scope, submission guidelines, review policy, frequency of publication and other pertinent details

research_paper_structure.meaning: The structure of a research paper typically includes abstract, keywords, introduction, literature review, methods, results and discussion, and conclusions

thesis_structure.meaning: The structure of a thesis or dissertation includes abstract, introduction, methods, results, discussion, and conclusions

study_significance.relation_to_existing_research: Show how the study contributes to the extant literature

literature_review.required_depth: Detailing studies closely related to the project

results_presentation.requirements: Data should be ordered logically to guide the reader

objectives: Integration of study results with existing theory

error: The input does not provide necessary information related to GOST, its structural elements, or design rules
